stepTitle: Carson wants to make $$20$$ pounds of trail mix using nuts and chocolate chips. His budget requires that the trail mix costs him $$\$7.60$$ per pound. Nuts cost $$\$9.00$$ per pound and chocolate chips cost $$\$2.00$$ per pound. How many pounds of nuts and how many pounds of chocolate chips should he use? (Answer in the form with the number of a variable followed by the first letter of the variable (nuts $$=$$ n): 2n13c (These numbers are not the answers))
